review: I did not even knew about the movie before i saw it today almost after five years of its release. I liked the movie very much & could be the inspiration for those who wish to pursue their career in writing & Direction in theFilms.
Had seen CPBH in 2012 in theatres and tv, and now saw it on Voot, it's superb, hits you right there where it matters
Ya it was a very good movie. But nobody knows abt it. Very bad publicity.
A good movie with all ups and downs ,properly rhythm is maintained,very much realistic.
